value:
"I am Corrin, silent as a whisper and
subtle as the shadows themselves."$k$p...Well? How did that one sound?

In Hoshido, ninja also serve as spies.
Whenever I hear "ninja," I always think
of Kaze, Saizo, and Kagero.

Oops, you spotted me! I was trying
my best to stay hidden, but it looks
like I've still got a lot to learn.

I sent some traditional outfits to my
siblings in Nohr as a sort of cultural
exchange. Elise sounded so excited!

How does Saizo appear out of thin
air like that? I should ask him to teach
me the trick behind it...

This is from $Nf.
I hope the two of you
continue to get along.

This is going pretty well, huh? Maybe
I should try becoming a real ninja!

Mission accomplished.
On to the next target...
Seems I got a little carried away...
As you command!

I'm Corrin. This is the outfit worn by
Hoshido's covert ninja. Oh, but don't
worry—I'm just here for the festival!

I once heard that samurai serve at
their lord's side, while ninja serve
from the shadows.$k$pBut that is hardly unique to Hoshido.
Leveraging the talents of each warrior
is the key to success in Nohr as well.$k$pI wonder... Is this festival a way for
us to see how the other side lives?
If so, our ancestors were indeed wise.$k$pI still have much to learn about
my birthplace, but I'm going to
study as hard as I can every day.$k$pI look forward to your counsel and
friendship both during this festival,
and after, $Nu.
せやっ
成敗！
うわあっ
このままじゃ…
Did I catch you off guard?
You're wide open!
This is divine punishment!
I will see this mission through!
Mission failed...
ふふふ…
This is the garb of Hoshidan ninja. Does it suit me well?
Whoa! To think I let you sneak up on me... What a rookie mistake.
I was born in Hoshido but raised in Nohr, so I'm glad for the chance to learn more about my birthplace's culture.
Elise sure gets a kick out of this whole ninja thing, huh? They're a rarity in Nohr, so I guess it makes sense.
Every time I try to practice blending into a crowd, one of my siblings shouts a greeting at me...
I hope to someday match Kaze's shuriken skill... He makes it look so cool!
"I would die before failing you, master!" Heh. Do I sound like a real ninja yet?
Understood.
Your orders?
I'll take care of it.
